product.name: Weber Original Kettle Premium Charcoal Grill, 22-Inch, Black
product.description: Spark your passion for charcoal grilling with the Kettle that started it all. The Original Kettle Premium charcoal grill boasts upgraded features, such as a hinged cooking grate for easily adding charcoal while grilling, and the One-Touch cleaning system with high-capacity ash catcher, making for a smooth grilling experience from beginning to end.
product.bullet_points:
• Holds up to 13 burgers made with a Weber burger press
• One-Touch cleaning system with high-capacity ash catcher provides hassle-free ash cleanup
• Porcelain-enameled lid and bowl retain heat, and won’t rust or peel
• Use the lid hook to avoid placing the lid on the ground while grilling
• Cooking grate is hinged for easily adding charcoal while grilling
